Sentencas: This paper reports an investigation on the structure-properties correlation of trivalent metal oxide (Al2O3)-doped V2O5 ceramics synthesized by the melt-quench technique.
Titulo: Influence of Al3+ doping for V5+ on the structural, optical, thermal and electrical properties of V2-xAlxO5-δ (x=0-0.20) ceramics

Sentencas: XRD patterns confirmed a single orthorhombic V2O5 phase formation with increasing strain on the doping of Al2O3 in place of V2O5 in the samples estimated by Williamson-Hall analysis.
Titulo: Influence of Al3+ doping for V5+ on the structural, optical, thermal and electrical properties of V2-xAlxO5-δ (x=0-0.20) ceramics

Sentencas: FTIR and Raman investigations revealed a structural change as [VO5] polyhedra converts into [VO4] polyhedra on the doping of Al2O3 into V2O5.
Titulo: Influence of Al3+ doping for V5+ on the structural, optical, thermal and electrical properties of V2-xAlxO5-δ (x=0-0.20) ceramics

Sentencas: The optical band gap was found in a wide semiconductor range as confirmed by UV-visible spectroscopy analysis.
Titulo: Influence of Al3+ doping for V5+ on the structural, optical, thermal and electrical properties of V2-xAlxO5-δ (x=0-0.20) ceramics

Sentencas: The thermal and conductivity behavior of the prepared samples were studied using thermal gravimetric analysis (TGA) and impedance analyzer, respectively.
Titulo: Influence of Al3+ doping for V5+ on the structural, optical, thermal and electrical properties of V2-xAlxO5-δ (x=0-0.20) ceramics

Sentencas: All the prepared ceramics exhibit good DC conductivity (0.22-0.36 Sm-1) at 400 degrees C. These materials can be considered for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC)/battery applications due to their good conductivity and good thermal stability.
Titulo: Influence of Al3+ doping for V5+ on the structural, optical, thermal and electrical properties of V2-xAlxO5-δ (x=0-0.20) ceramics
